about_the_game:
A game about building and exploring connections.

Explore a unique and vibrant world, meeting diverse characters while you explore and build connections with the community. A game selected in the first Outersloth (Innersloth Development Fund) group!

Narrative Exploration

A game filled with captivating locations, items and people. Learn to master the Fivehold Factor as you build a mental model of the fantastical world around you.

Speak with people to learn about the world as it is, as it was, and as it will be. Become part of the community to learn even more.

Build and Destroy

Deconstruct abandoned LiFE corporation facilities and re-purpose their parts to build and replace essential structures in the community.

A roving research lab

Ride around with your ROV-R research lab as you uncover depth, discover mystery, and unravel what The Mossfield Archives contains. Research new technology to solve problems and reshape your daily life.
